item.title: Hello Developer: September 2025
item.description: Get ready for an exciting design update! ğŸ¨ Whether you’re an experienced developer or just starting out, discover resources to enhance your apps and games. item.title: Tax and Price Updates for Apps, In-App Purchases, and Subscriptions
item.description: ğŸŒ The App Store is adjusting prices for apps and in-app purchases due to recent tax and exchange rate changes. ğŸ“… As of August 21, updates include new VAT rates in Estonia and Romania, along with a digital services tax removal in Canada. The Philippines and Vietnam have introduced new VAT and personal income tax rates for developers. ğŸ”„ Starting September 8, pricing updates will occur for apps not using the Philippines or Vietnam as their base storefront. For further details on managing prices,…
